Class oracle.html.BlockQuote 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.CompoundItem
                   |
                   +----oracle.html.BlockQuote
public class BlockQuote
extends CompoundItem

Description:

BlockQuote as specified in HTML. This usually contains text quoted from another source.

Instructions:

Use this class to indicate that text quoted from another source is embedded in your page.

Example: 

// Create an empty BlockQuote object
BlockQuote bq = new BlockQuote();
// Add Items to block quote object
bq.addItem("Your favorite poem");

See Also:
CompoundItem

Creates an empty Block Quote object
